_sText:
mg_xmas_nipperhouse

 Nipper made an awesome work at making this map.

[SG] Paul modified it after, and added many things to make the map Hide and Seek and more fun. Like overlays, console messages, commands. He modified it on his server with a plugin, by adding new things like a mini size for ct (more hides), and a santa skin for terrorist, or give a m249 after a timelimit to the winner. But all these changes used non-official Sourcemod plugins.

I made the same change he did for his server, and I added a few more things. It's not anymore plugin-dependant.
What To Do.

CT = Hide for 3 minutes in the house, and outside. You have a reduced size, so you can go in many spots. Your speed is a little faster than the T.

T = After 30 seconds, you can move and start to hunt the CT. You have a Santa skin, a Knife, and a normal size.

After 3 minutes, CT get a M249, and can kill the Terrorist who also get ignited 10 seconds after to slowly kill them ^^

Feature
  • Santa Skin made by S-Low
  • Many Overlays with Sounds that are triggered randomly in the map (made by [SG] Paul)
  • "Jingle Bell" music
  • Mini-Sized CT
  • Santa T
  • An "hidden" mini santa. It does something if you press E on it.

What Else ?

 I modified the whole map with EntSpy, so I didnt decompiled anything. If I decompiled the map, it would have been broken.
Some spots were unreachable by the T, so the CT where invulnerable there. I added some push to block these spots.

Santa Skin

 You can find the skin there: http://css.gamebanana.com/skins/129123

One overlay of the map

 This is one exemple of overlay, you could see in the map:

Enjoy
